about_the_game:
Karma Guardians is a unique RPG that takes place in the world of Ethera, where you can explore the natural world and learn from its inhabitants. You will explore vast and beautiful landscapes in Ethera, all while interacting with animals and uncovering the secrets of the land.

The main goal of Karma Guardians is to restore nine magical rune stones that have been detached from their "soul" and need to be healed so the "Life Force" of nature can be restored. In the process of healing the rune stones, the player must fulfill quests, explore new areas and find hidden secrets.

Currency in the game is called "Hydro Honey" and is used with merchants to buy items, as well as paying for other buffs, bribes and buying maps from NPCs.

This game has an MMO player controller (player movement) so it will feel comfortable to you if you have played an MMO.

The player stats are similar to old-school RPG table-top D20 games, including the stats "Strength", "Charisma" and "Intelligence", as well as some new stats unique to this game like "Nature Affinity" and "Prana".

The Dialog for each NPC is influenced by AI, and features a dialog wheel similar to games like Mass Effect, which make it easy to interact with NPCs.
